title: Eleven Town
description: In a dystopian future where families are torn apart to maintain the highest rate of fertility, a terrible disease is rampaging through Eleven Town. No one is immune.The only hope is the New Project. A completely new direction that everyone believes will save them all.Deni is a good citizen of Eleven Town. He always follows the townâ€™s stringent rules and works hard on the New Project even as society crumbles around him.But Deni is dragged into a power struggle to control the future. His eyes are eventually opened to the ruthlessness around him and he learns the truth about life in Eleven Town.Eleven Town is a short sci-fi novel of 22,000 words.
author: John-Paul Cleary
